compositions.description:
Basic mechanics of the Pen Tool:
- Basic Usage
- Click-And-Drag to edit Bezier
curvature during path creation
compositions.name: Pen Tool --- Basic (1/4)

actions.descr: Panning on the canvas with the "hand" tool
actions.name: MOVE CANVAS

actions.descr: Modifying vertices with an existing path
actions.name: Drag V1

actions.descr: Holding SHIFT during drag enables SNAP-TO-GRID
actions.name: SHIFT IN

compositions.description:
Auxiliary Tools to edit paths:

- "-": Remove Anchor Tool,
- "+": Add Anchor Tool,
- "SHIFT+C": Scissor Tool
compositions.name: Pen Tool --- Basic (2/4)

actions.descr: Create some objects on the canvas
actions.name: First move
